titles.title: CB 146 When I Feel The Touch

properties.copyright: 1978 Authentic Publishing, Administered by The Copyright Company

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
WHEN I FEEL THE TOUCH OF YOUR HAND
Upon my life, it causes me to sing this song that I
love You, Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
So from deep within, my spirit singeth unto Thee,
You are my King, You are my God, and I love
You, Lord.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Lord, I love You, Lord, I love You, Lord, I love
You, I love You, Lord.
